recoursemech: In addition to Ex3’s robust and thorough in-house privacy policy and process for handling privacy disputes, Ex3 will provide full cooperation with any independent recourse mechanism that Ex3 and the client feel is a fair and adequate mechanism for investigating unresolved complaints, but only if the proposed recourse mechanism incorporates the Safe Harbor Framework and/or will fully cooperate with EU data protection authorities (DPAs). We are members of the American Arbitration Association for Safe Harbor dispute resolution.
